file_content.text: Please give us some information about the quest you just abandoned. (%questName) Thank you!
Other comments about your abandoned quest?
Why did you abandon this quest?
Thank you for playtesting! Please take the time to answer a couple of questions about your companion character.
How often do you use your companion's ability?
How often do you equip items on your companion?
Overall, how much do you enjoy your companion?
7 - I enjoy playing with my companion.
9 - I love playing with my companion.
How useful is your companion in combat?
Thank you for playtesting! Please take the time to answer a couple of questions about the world map (the map accessible by hitting the 'M' key).
How easy or hard is it to navigate using your world map?
How easy or hard is it to find quest objectives and other goals on your world map?
How frequently do you use your world map?
How difficult was it to update the items your character used?
Are you currently playing the class you are most interested in playing at release?
I was, but switched - didn't like the class
I'm not - I want to save the experience for live
I am - but not really enjoying it
I am - and I love it!
How easy was it to kill your first enemy / monster?
Did you select your advanced class already?
I do not know how to select an advanced class
What information did you use to select your advanced class?
Information provided by the advanced class tutor
Information from a friend or other player
How easy was it for you to find your skill tree?
How would you rate the directions provided for this Flashpoint?
How would you rate the story provided for this Flashpoint?
How would you rate the content provided for this Flashpoint?
How would you rate the item drops you received in this Flashpoint?
Did you participate in a group within this Flashpoint?
I was in a group of 2
I was in a group of 3
I was in a full group 4
How would you rate this Flashpoint overall?
What are your opinions and/or feedback regarding the current group size (4 players/companions)?
What are your opinions and/or feedback on counting companions as group members?
Did you initially attempt to complete this Heroic Quest solo?
Yes, attempted to complete, but abandone
No, did not attempt to complete this solo
No, I grouped before attempting this quest
How many players did you complete this Heroic Quest with?
I was in a group of 2
I was in a group of 3
I was in a full group of 4
How challenging was this Heroic quest for your group?
How would you rate the effectiveness of your class's role while in a group?
How many abilities do you use while fighting more difficult mobs in a group?
Describe how difficult it was to get a group together for this Heroic quest:
What are your opinions and/or feedback regarding the current group size (4 players/companions)?
What are your opinions and/or feedback on counting companions as group members?
While playing, how many CTD's (crashes to desktop) do you generally experience?
At Least Once Every 1 to 2 Hours
At Least Once Every 2 to 3 Hours
Very Rarely (Maybe once per game session)
Please rate your Frame Rate performance:
Please rate the severity of Lag:
How would you rate the difficulty of learning how to play your class?
How enjoyable has your experience been with gaining levels so far?
How would you rate the quantity of experience (XP) you are gaining from quest completions?
Need to award a bit more
Way too much - needs to be lowered
How would you rate the quantity of experience (XP) you are gaining from monsters?
Need to award a bit more
Way too much - needs to be lowered
What did you feel gave you the most experience?
Are you still playing the original class you started with?
I was, but switched - didn't like the class
I'm not - I want to save the experience for live
I am - but not really enjoying it
I am - and I love it!
How would you rate the directions provided for the objectives of this quest?
How would you rate this quest's story?
How well did this story fit in the overall Star Wars Universe?
How would you rate the reward you received from this quest?
How difficult was this quest to complete solo?
Too difficult for solo, I had to group
Very difficult, but I was able to complete
Not Applicable - Never attempted to solo quest
How often do you group up with other players to complete tasks?
How did you find a group?
I used the social window / looking for option
I asked people questing near me
I asked people that I already knew / met
I could not find a group
I never looked for a group

How many abilities do you use in a single solo mob fight?
What quantities of your class abilities feel useful in a solo setting?
How easy was it to find quests to complete?

Too difficult for solo, I had to group
Very difficult, but I was able to complete

Not Applicable - Never attempted to solo quest
I did not use the Multiplayer Conversation System
I did not use the Multiplayer Conversation System
How would you rate this quest's story?
How often did you find an item drop that you or your companion needed?
Where do you get the majority of the items you use?
Where do you get the majority of the items your companion uses?
How often do you upgrade or switch items you are using?
How often do you group up with other players to complete tasks?
If you are in a group, do you change the loot mechanic?
How easy was it to find quests to complete?
No - I did not know you can change it
No - Round Robin is the fairest form of loot distribution
Yes - Free for All is the fairest form of loot distribution
Yes - I alternate between Round Robin and Free for All depending on the group
How would you rate the instructions provided for Crew Skills?
How easy was it to obtain materials needed to gather?
What will you use the materials you gathered for?
Save Materials to Craft an Item I want
Sell materials to other players or vendors for profit
Sell materials because I do not know what to do with them
How would you rate the Crew Skill system overall?
How would you rate the instructions provided for Crew Skills?
How easy was it to obtain materials needed to craft?
Please rate the usefulness of the items you crafted:
How would you rate the Crew Skill system overall?
Did you make use of the Auction House during this play session?
Yes - I put items up for Auction
How difficult was it to locate the Auction House?
How would rate the functionality/usability of the UI for the Auction House?
How would you rate the effectiveness of your class while solo?
How many abilities do you use in a single solo mob fight?
What quantities of your class abilities feel useful in a solo setting?
How would you rate the overall effectiveness of your Companion Characters?
Please rate your overall enjoyment of the Companion Characters:
They do not add to my enjoyment of the game
I feel they are an asset to the class
I do not have a Companion Character yet
I only have one Companion Character
I did not know how to select another Companion Character
I like the one I am currently using and do not want to select another
How would you rate the controllability of your Companion Characters:
How would you rate this Class quest's storyline?
How would you rate the content in this Class quest?
How would you rate this Class quest's Voice Acting?
How would you rate this Class quest's Dark Side/Light Side options?
How would you rate the reward you received from this quest's completion?
Based on your experience today, how likely are you to recommend The Old Republic to a friend?
10 - Definitely will recommend to a friend
1 - Definitely will not recommend to a friend
How do you feel about participating in groups?
I participate in groups only when I have to
I participate in groups to play with friends or colleagues
I participate in groups to make new friends
I prefer to only play in a group
When you are in a group what role do you prefer?
I prefer to do anything that supports the group
I prefer to do whatever I want
What is your ideal group make up for SW:TOR?
1 Real Player + 1 Companion or play by myself
How does your companion's performance in a group compare to yours or other players?
If your group is full with 2 players and 2 companions, what would your typical response be if a player asks to join your group?
Do not invite that player, my group is full
Do not invite that player, I only play with people I know
Invite that player, a real player can help more than a companion
Invite that player, the player may need help
Invite that player, I want to meet more people
How would you feel about this statement, "Companions play as well as real players?"
Thank you for your feedback. Please fill out all sections, to help ensure this issue gets promptly reviewed and resolved.
Details (Please give all available information to find and reproduce this issue).
Congratulations on reaching another level! Please take a couple of seconds to respond to these questions about your recent experience playing this class, so we can make The Old Republic better.
How powerful was your character for your level?
How fun was playing your class at this level?
Did you get loot and quest rewards often enough?
How quickly did you level up?
Congratulations on completing a quest. Please take some time to offer your feedback on the quest, so we can make The Old Republic better!
What did you think about the story and dialogue for this quest?
Was the activity to complete this quest fun? (An activity is a player action like killing creatures, finding items, or destroying objects).
What did you think about the quest you just completed?
Thank you for playing The Old Republic today. Before you go, please answer these brief questions.
How was game performance (framerate/lag) on a scale of 1 to 5?
Would you buy The Old Republic?
What was the most frustrating part of the game?
Would you recommend The Old Republic to your friends?
How would you compare the new user interface to the old?
How would you rate the new Character Creation process?
How would you compare the new character creation process to the old?
I prefer the old user interface
I prefer the new user interface
I do not prefer one over the other
I prefer the old character creation process
I prefer the new character creation process
I do not prefer on over the other
How would you rate your experience with the new user interface?
How would you rate the reward you received from this quest?
How difficult was it to complete this quest?
Did you complete this quest solo, or in a group?
I completed it in a group of 2-3 players
I completed it in a full group
How would you rate the directions that described how to complete this quest's objectives?
How challenging is your progression through this planet's content?
There isn't enough of a challenge
How many other players did you complete this Heroic quest with?
Did you use any Companion Characters to complete this Heroic quest?
Was the group size recommendation for this Heroic quest appropriate for the actual difficulty?
Rate how difficult it was to get a group together for this Heroic quest:
How would you rate this Heroic quest overall?
I was in a group of 2
I was in a group of 3
I was in a full group of 4
No, we did not use any Companion Characters
Yes, the suggested group size was appropriate
No, the suggested group size was too low
No, the suggested group size was too high
I didn't know what the suggested group size was
Did you select your "Advanced Class" already?
What information did you use to select your advanced class?
How easy was it for you to find your skill tree?
I do not know how to select an Advanced Class
Information provided by the Advanced Class tutor
Information from a friend or other player
How would you rate the directions provided for this Flashpoint?
How would you rate the story in this Flashpoint?
How would you rate the item drops you received in this Flashpoint?

How would you rate this Flashpoint overall?
No, I was able to complete it solo
No, but it was very difficult to solo
